cm:seed.description: Create a Stack from existing content types, entries, assets, etc
examples: $ csdx cm:seed -r "account/repository" -s "stack-uid" //seed content into specific stack
$ csdx cm:seed -r "account/repository" -o "your-org-uid" -n "stack-name" //create a new stack in given org uid

org.name: org
org.description: Provide Organization UID to create a new stack

stack.name: stack
stack.description: Provide stack UID to seed content to

stack-name.name: stack-name
stack-name.description: Name of a new stack that needs to be created.

fetch-limit.name: fetch-limit
fetch-limit.description: Limit for number of Organizations or stacks to be fetched
